data.title: Royal Jewels of the World Message Board: Re: Princess Margaretha of Denmarks jewels sold, or resold?

data.text:
Very interesting. Thank you for bringing it to our attention. The way I read it it does indeed look like the Count is the present vendor.

As for photographs with Princess Margaretha wearing any of these items.. I think at least I was able to find one where she seems to be wearing the lovely diamond rose brooch. It was during the 1970 Nobel Ceremony:

Previous Message

Several jewels from Princess Margaretha were sold on February 14, 2023 according to lot-art.com.

Provenance: Princess Margaretha of Sweden (1899-1977); thence by descent to her grandson Birger Valdemar Georg Flemming Kai Axel, Count of Rosenborg, the present vendor.

Do they mean that Count Birger is the present vendor, or is the present vendor anonymous?

An emerald, pearl and diamond brooch

https://www.lot-art.com/auction-lots/An-emerald-pearl-and-diamond-brooch-in-the-form-of-a-loop/242-emerald_pearl_diamond_brooch_in-14.2.23-mellor

A diamond rose brooch, with old cut diamonds

https://www.lot-art.com/auction-lots/A-diamond-rose-brooch-with-old-cut-diamonds-mounted-in-sil/243-diamond_rose_brooch-14.2.23-mellor

A sapphire and diamond bracelet

https://www.lot-art.com/auction-lots/A-sapphire-and-diamond-bracelet-the-single-oval-sapphire-ap/241-sapphire_diamond_bracelet_single_oval-14.2.23-mellor

A pair of diamond earrings

https://www.lot-art.com/auction-lots/A-pair-of-diamond-earrings-19th-c-with-round-cushion-and/240-diamond_earrings_19th_c-14.2.23-mellor

A diamond bracelet, of old cut diamonds

https://www.lot-art.com/auction-lots/A-diamond-bracelet-of-old-cut-diamonds-diamond-set-in-mill/238-diamond_bracelet_old_cut_diamonds-14.2.23-mellor

I recognize the emerald, pearl and diamond brooch being worn by Princess Ingeborg and Margaretha.

Are there any photos of Princess Margaretha wearing the other jewels?

The rose brooch and the diamond earrings are very beautiful. Sorry to see these jewels leave the Rosenborg family.
